snippet: Tom Colicchio — the head judge on the “Top Chef” television show who runs his own restaurant empire — will bring his talents to the nation’s capital on Tuesday as a board member of Food Policy Action, which is looking at creating its own...
abstract: Tom Colicchio — the head judge on the “Top Chef” television show who runs his own restaurant empire — will bring his talents to the nation’s capital on Tuesday as a board member of Food Policy Action, which is looking at creating its own political action committee to get involved in the 2014 Congressional races.

headline.main: From 'Top Chef' Judge to Political Player
